name: Jumping Roo
description:
Jumping Roo

The player guides a pixelated kangaroo named Roo across a side-scrolling landscape, avoiding obstacles to achieve the highest score.

How to play

  • Maintain Jump to jump higher.
  • Maintain Run increase your horizontal velocity.
  • Moving left and right can help you dodge the obstacles.

Keyboard controls:

Roo:

Jump - Ctrl / K / X
Run- Alt / Z / J
Moving left - Left Arrow / A
Moving Right - Right Arrow / D

Menu:

Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Comfirm - Alt / Z / J
